6-- | Decode token trees to contents.
7
8module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Decode
9  ( -- * Functions
10    ContentCons, ContentCalc, 
11    contentCons, treesToJudge,

13    -- * Assert type
14    AssertType (..),
15    assertAs,
16    assertSymbol,
17
18    -- * Document
19  
20    -- ** Simple data
21    -- $SimpleData
22  
23    -- ** Compound data
24    -- $CompoundData
25  ) where
26
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type             as D
30import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Singleton    as D
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Complex  as D
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Simple   as D
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Tree     as D
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Utility  as D
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message          as Msg
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Message  as Msg

38
39
40-- ----------------------  General content
41
42-- | Content constructor.
43type ContentCons c = S.TTreeToAb c
44
45-- | Content calculator.
46type ContentCalc c = S.TTreeToAb c
47
48-- | Convert token tree into internal form of content.
49contentCons :: forall c. (D.CContent c) => ContentCalc c -> ContentCons c
50contentCons calc tree = Msg.abLiteral tree $ cons tree where
51    cons :: ContentCons c
52    cons x@(B.TreeL t)
53        = eithcon (eithcon (eithcon (token t)
54            D.putClock  $ D.tokenClock t)
55            D.putTime   $ D.treesToTime   [x])
56            decimal     $ D.treesToDigits [x]
57    cons g@(B.TreeB b _ xs) = case b of
58        S.BracketGroup   -> group g
59        S.BracketList    -> D.putList   =<< consContents cons xs
60        S.BracketSet     -> D.putSet    =<< consContents cons xs
61        S.BracketTie     ->                 consAngle    cons xs
62        S.BracketRel     -> D.putRel    =<< consRel      cons xs
63        S.BracketType    -> D.putType   =<< consType          xs
64        S.BracketInterp  -> D.putInterp =<< D.treesToInterp   xs
65        _                -> Msg.unkBracket
66
67    token :: S.Token -> B.Ab c
68    token (S.TText _ n w)
69        | n <= S.TextRaw     = keyword w
70        | n == S.TextQ       = D.putCode w
71        | otherwise          = D.putText w
72    token (S.TTermN _ _ n)   = D.putTerm n
73    token (S.TTerm _ _ [n])  = D.putTerm n
74    token t                  = Msg.unkWord $ S.tokenContent t
75
76    group :: S.TTreeToAb c
77    group g@(B.TreeB _ _ xs@(S.TextLeaf f _ _ : _))
78        | f  > S.TextRaw     = eith g text $ D.treesToTexts True xs
79        | f == S.TextRaw     = eithcon (eith g
80                                 D.putTime $ D.treesToTime   xs)
81                                 decimal   $ D.treesToDigits xs
82    group (B.TreeB _ _ [])   = Right D.empty
83    group g                  = calc g
84
85    eithcon f      = either (const f)
86    eith g         = either (const $ calc g)
87    text           = D.putText . concat
88    decimal        = D.putDec B.<=< D.decodeDecimal
89
90    keyword :: (D.CEmpty c, D.CBool c) => String -> B.Ab c
91    keyword "(+)"  = Right D.true
92    keyword "(-)"  = Right D.false
93    keyword "(/)"  = Right D.end
94    keyword "0"    = Right D.false
95    keyword "1"    = Right D.true
96    keyword "dum"  = Right D.dum
97    keyword "dee"  = Right D.dee
98    keyword w      = Msg.unkWord w
99
100-- List of contents
101--
102--   { 0 | 1 | 2 }
103--   [ 0 | 1 | 2 ]
104--     .........
105--     :
106--     consContents
107
108consContents :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCons c -> S.TTreesToAb [c]
109consContents _   [] = Right []
110consContents cons cs = lt `mapM` S.divideTreesByBar cs where
111    lt []   = Right D.empty
112    lt [x]  = cons x
113    lt xs   = cons $ B.TreeB S.BracketGroup Nothing xs
114
115-- Contents enclosed in angle brackets
116--
117--   << /a 1  /b 2  /c 3 >>   << words "a b c" >>
118--      ................         .............
119--      :                        :
120--      consAngle                consAngle
121
122consAngle :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCons c -> S.TTreesToAb c
123consAngle cons xs@(S.TermLeafName _ _ _ : _) = D.putTie =<< consTie cons xs
124consAngle _ [] = D.putTie []
125consAngle _ [S.TextLeafRaw _ "words", S.TextLeafQQ _ ws] = D.putList $ map D.pText $ words ws
126consAngle _ _ = Msg.adlib "unknown angle bracket"
127
128-- Tie
129--
130--   {- /a 1  /b 2  /c 3 -}
131--      ................
132--      :
133--      consTie
134
135consTie :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCons c -> S.TTreesToAb [S.Term c]
136consTie cons = mapM p B.<=< D.treesToTerms1 where
137    p (name, tree) = Right . (name,) =<< cons tree
138
139-- | Convert token trees into a judge.
140--   Judges itself are not content type.
141--   It can be only used in the top-level of resources.
142treesToJudge :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCalc c -> AssertType -> D.JudgeClass -> S.TTreesToAb (D.Judge c)
143treesToJudge calc q p = Right . assertAs q p B.<=< consTie (contentCons calc)
144
145
146-- ----------------------  Relation
147--
148--        .............  consRel  ..............
149--        :                                    :
150--     {= /a /b /c  [ 0 | 1 | 2 ]  [ 3 | 4 | 5 ] =}
151--        ........  .............  .............
152--        :         :              :
153--        :         consRelTuple   consRelTuple
154--        consTermNames
155--
156
157consRel :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCons c -> S.TTreesToAb (D.Rel c)
158consRel cons xs =
159    do bo <- consRelTuple cons n `mapM` xs'
160       Right $ D.Rel he $ B.unique bo
161    where
162      (ns, xs')  = consTermNames xs
163      n          = length ns
164      he         = D.headFrom ns
165
166consTermNames :: S.TTreesTo ([S.TermName], [S.TTree])
167consTermNames = terms [] where
168    terms ns (S.TermLeafName _ _ n : xs) = terms (n : ns) xs
169    terms ns xs = (reverse ns, xs)
170
171consRelTuple :: (D.CContent c) => ContentCons c -> Int -> S.TTreeToAb [c]
172consRelTuple cons n g@(B.TreeB S.BracketList _ xs) =
173    do cs <- consContents cons xs
174       let n' = length cs
175       B.when (n /= n') $ Msg.abLiteral g $ Msg.oddRelation n n'
176       Right cs
177consRelTuple _ _ g = Msg.abLiteral g $ Msg.reqRelTuple
178
179
180-- ----------------------  Assert type
181
182data AssertType
183    = AssertAffirm       -- ^ @|==@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
184    | AssertDeny         -- ^ @|=x@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
185    | AssertMultiDeny    -- ^ @|=xx@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
186    | AssertChange       -- ^ @|=c@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
187    | AssertMultiChange  -- ^ @|=cc@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
188    | AssertViolate      -- ^ @|=v@ /pattern/ @:@ /relmap/
189      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
190
191assertSymbol :: AssertType -> String
192assertSymbol AssertAffirm       = "|=="
193assertSymbol AssertDeny         = "|=X"
194assertSymbol AssertMultiDeny    = "|=XX"
195assertSymbol AssertChange       = "|=C"
196assertSymbol AssertMultiChange  = "|=CC"
197assertSymbol AssertViolate      = "|=V"
198
199assertAs :: AssertType -> D.JudgeOf c
200assertAs AssertAffirm        = D.JudgeAffirm
201assertAs AssertDeny          = D.JudgeDeny
202assertAs AssertMultiDeny     = D.JudgeMultiDeny
203-- assertAs AssertChange        = D.JudgeChange
204-- assertAs AssertMultiChange   = D.JudgeMultiChange
205assertAs AssertViolate       = D.JudgeViolate
206
207
208-- ----------------------  Type
209
210-- | Literal reader for types.
211consType :: S.TTreesToAb D.Type
212consType = gen where
213    gen xs = case S.divideTreesByBar xs of
214               [x] ->  single x
215               xs2 ->  Right . D.TypeSum =<< mapM gen xs2
216
217    single [B.TreeB _ _ xs]  = gen xs
218    single (S.TextLeaf f _ n : xs)
219        | f == S.TextRaw     = dispatch n xs
220        | otherwise          = Msg.quoteType n
221    single []                = Right $ D.TypeSum []
222    single _                 = Msg.unkType ""
223
224    precision ws [S.TextLeafRaw _ w] | w `elem` ws = Right $ Just w
225    precision _ []  = Right Nothing
226    precision _ _   = Msg.unkType "precision"
227
228    clock = ["sec", "min", "hour", "day"]
229    time  = "month" : clock
230
231    dispatch "any"     _    = Right D.TypeAny
232    dispatch "empty"   _    = Right D.TypeEmpty
233    dispatch "boolean" _    = Right D.TypeBool
234    dispatch "text"    _    = Right D.TypeText
235    dispatch "code"    _    = Right D.TypeCode
236    dispatch "decimal" _    = Right D.TypeDec
237    dispatch "clock"   xs   = Right . D.TypeClock  =<< precision clock xs
238    dispatch "time"    xs   = Right . D.TypeTime   =<< precision time  xs
239    dispatch "binary"  _    = Right D.TypeBin
240    dispatch "term"    _    = Right D.TypeTerm
241    dispatch "type"    _    = Right D.TypeType
242    dispatch "interp"  _    = Right D.TypeInterp
243
244    dispatch "tag"   xs     = case xs of
245                                [tag, colon, typ]
246                                    | D.treeToText False colon == Right ":"
247                                      -> do tag' <- D.treeToText False tag
248                                            typ' <- gen [typ]
249                                            Right $ D.TypeTag tag' typ'
250                                _   -> Msg.unkType "tag"
251    dispatch "list"  xs     = Right . D.TypeList =<< gen xs
252    dispatch "set"   xs     = Right . D.TypeSet  =<< gen xs
253    dispatch "tuple" xs     = do ts <- mapM (gen. B.li1) xs
254                                 Right $ D.TypeTuple ts
255    dispatch "tie"   xs     = do ts1 <- D.treesToTerms xs
256                                 ts2 <- B.sequenceSnd $ B.mapSndTo gen ts1
257                                 Right $ D.TypeTie ts2
258    dispatch "rel"   xs     = do ts1 <- D.treesToTerms xs
259                                 ts2 <- B.sequenceSnd $ B.mapSndTo gen ts1
260                                 Right $ D.TypeRel ts2
261    dispatch n _            = Msg.unkType n
262
263
264-- ------------------------------------------------------------------
265-- $SimpleData
266--
267--  Prepere some definitions.
268--
269--  >>> :m +Koshucode.Baala.Op.Vanilla.Type
270--  >>> let trees = B.ttrees . B.tokens
271--  >>> let lit  = contentCons [] :: S.TTree -> B.Ab BaalaC
272--  >>> let lits = consContents lit . trees
273--
274--  Boolean.
275--
276--    >>> lits "#true : #false"
277--    Right [VBool True, VBool False]
278--
279--  Words.
280--
281--    >>> lits "'a : 'b #sp 'c"
282--    Right [VText "a", VText "b c"]
283--
284--  Decimal.
285--
286--    >>> lits "12.0"
287--    Right [VDec (Decimal (120, 10), 1, False)]
288--
289--  Empty as no ordinary value.
290--
291--    >>> lits "()"
292--    Right [VEmpty]
293--
294
295-- ------------------------------------------------------------------
296-- $CompoundData
297--
298--  Set.
299--
300--    >>> lits "{ 'b | 'a | 'a | 'c | 'a }"
301--    Right [VSet [VText "b", VText "a", VText "c"]]
302--
303--  List.
304--
305--    >>> lits "[ 'a | '10 | 20 ]"
306--    Right [VList [VText "a", VText "10", VDec (Decimal (20, 1), 0, False)]]
307--
308--  Tie.
309--
310--    >>> lits "{- /a 'x  /b { 'y | 'z } -}"
311--    Right [VTie 
312--      [ ("/a", VText "x")
313--      , ("/b", VSet [VText "y", VText "z"])]]
314--
315--  Relation.
316--
317--    >>> lits "{= /a /x [ 'A1 | 20 ][ 'A3 | 40 ][ 'A4 | 60 ] =}"
318--    Right [VRel (Rel
319--      (Relhead [Term "/a", Term "/x"]),
320--      [ [VText "A1", VDec (Decimal (20,1), 0, False)]
321--      , [VText "A3", VDec (Decimal (40,1), 0, False)]
322--      , [VText "A4", VDec (Decimal (60,1), 0, False)] ])]
323--
324
